Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to deadlines for installing natural gas detectors and to repeal section 908.10 of the building code relating thereto
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Deadlines for installing natural gas detectors and to repeal section 908.10 of the building code relating thereto.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to requiring a solid acceptable color or the display of artwork on temporary protective structures on construction sites
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a solid acceptable color or the display of artwork on temporary protective structures on construction sites.
